verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:20
verses.text: That we also may be like all the nations; and that our king may judge us, and go out before us, and fight our battles.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:21
verses.text: And Samuel heard all the words of the people, and he rehearsed them in the ears of the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:22
verses.text: And the Lord said to Samuel, Hearken unto their voice, and make them a king. And Samuel said unto the men of Israel, Go ye every man unto his city.
